metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20566 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In l2cap_chan_put of l2cap_core, there is a possible use after free due toimproper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-165329981References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
